sentence.Network_en: At last the climbers succeeded in conquering the difficult mountain.
sentence.Network_cn: 登山队员们终于成功地征服了这座难以攀登的山峰.

sentence.Network_en: The long - cherished dream of conquering the Huanghe River will become a reality.
sentence.Network_cn: 征服黄河的梦想将会成为现实.

sentence.Network_en: In the wake of developments in science and technology, man has become more capable of conquering nature.
sentence.Network_cn: 随着科学技术的发展, 人们征服自然的能力也越来越强了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: maybe there's a sense of superiority for conquering the craving ?也许，一股征服自我的优越感油然而生？
in conquering Spain , the Moors brought papermaking to the West .他们征服西班牙时也把造纸工艺带到了西方。
So were those authors hailed as conquering heroes at the conference in Washington ?, 那么在华盛顿会议上这些作者被誉为征服一切的英雄了吗?
conquere 孔凯雷, conquering 战胜的, conquered 战败的

list.abs: nature的翻译中文意思-在线英汉词典 ... nature cure 自然疗法 conquer nature 征服自然 good nature 好心肠, 温和的性格, 好脾气.
Notebook: 200804 ... [I came, I saw, I conquered] 我来，我看，我征服［恺撒的名言]； [(to appeal) to the rod] 威迫的（言论）.
Numb_Encore... ... Cocksucker take one for your team 找个倒霉蛋抗打吧 I came,I saw,I conquered 我来了，我看见了，我征服了.
白领英语晨读经典美文365上册(MP3+文) ... Laugh 笑 Conquer Fear 战胜恐惧 You Are Special 你与众不同.
shouting english is very helpful in conquering your shyness ., 大喊英语对克服你的羞怯心理很有帮助.

entry.def: If one country or group of people conquers another, they take complete control of their land.

example.tran: 1936年，墨索里尼攻占了阿比西尼亚。

example.ex: Early in the eleventh century the whole of England was again conquered by the Vikings.
example.tran: 11世纪早期，整个英格兰再次被北欧海盗征服。

entry.def: If you conquer something such as a problem, you succeed in ending it or dealing with it successfully.

example.ex: I was certain that love was quite enough to conquer our differences...
example.tran: 我相信爱足以克服我们的种种差异。

example.ex: He has never conquered his addiction to smoking.

auth_sentence.content: In fact this is nothing new for conquering belief systems.
auth_sentence.res_content: In fact this is nothing new for conquering belief systems.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In fact this is nothing new for conquering belief systems.

auth_sentence.content: Why should conquering Burma be of significance to a Cockney?
